resources.string: Please report this error. Click to view the error report.

Privately browse the internet, for free! The Brave Private Browser App is your fast, free, and safe private web browser with ad blocker and pop-up blocker. Privately browse and search the internet without being tracked by advertisers, malware and pop-ups.
Brave uses the technical foundation of the Google Chrome (Chromium) - some people don\'t like this. Do you want to install Brave?
Welcome to Brave Beta for Android!\nTry out the newest features and give early feedback: https://brave.com/msupport\nYou can install Brave Beta alongside your current version of Brave for Android.

Welcome to Brave Nightly (Developer) for Android!\nTry out the newest features and give early feedback: https://brave.com/msupport\nYou can install Brave Nightly alongside your current version of Brave for Android.

Bromite aims at providing a no-clutter browsing experience without privacy-invasive features and with the addition of a fast ad-blocking engine. Minimal UI changes are applied to help curbing the idea of "browser as an advertisement platform".
Bromite uses the technical foundation of the Google Chrome (Chromium) - some people don\'t like this. Do you want to install Bromite?
The SystemWebView package contains the core browser/rendering engine of Bromite and its same features; it offers the possibility to replace the default browser component for the whole Android system.

The following error occurred when the download URL was fetched. If this error occurs frequently, feel free to report it on notabug.org, GitHub or GitLab. Please don\'t forget to add your crash report from the clipboard and the description of how you reproduce this error.

The following error occurred when checking for updates in the main view. If this error occurs frequently, feel free to report it on notabug.org, GitHub or GitLab. Please don\'t forget to add your crash report from the clipboard and the description of how you reproduce this error.
Unfortunately, FFUpdater has crashed. Please report this error on notabug.org, GitHub or GitLab. Add to your issue the crash report from the clipboard and a description on how to reproduce the bug.
The application requires Android %1$s. But your device is only running Android %2$s. Either choose a different app, update your operating system or switch to a newer smartphone.
Shows when app updates are downloaded in the background.
Notification about downloads in the background
Currently downloading updates for installed apps in the background.
Show errors of the background update checker

Firefox Browser for Android is automatically private and incredibly fast. Thousands of online trackers are following you every day, collecting information about where you go online and slowing down your speed. Firefox blocks over 2000 of these trackers by default and there are ad blocker add-ons available if you want to customize your browser even more. With Firefox, you’ll get the security you deserve and the speed you need in a private, mobile browser.
This app is designed for developers and testers. It may contain various bugs that can affect your usual work with the browser. Do you want to install it?
This is a modification of the Firefox browser aimed to increase privacy.

Firefox Klar is developed for Germany, Austria and Switzerland, but can be used by users in any country. It is very similar to Firefox Focus, but the name was changed in German-speaking countries to avoid confusion with the magazine Focus by Hubert Burda Media group. Unlike Firefox Focus, Firefox Klar has telemetry disabled by default due to strict German privacy laws.

Please note that this app used to be titled Firefox Preview. It has now been transitioned to Firefox Nightly. 

Firefox Nightly is a developmental channel for new Mozilla Firefox releases. 

Firefox Nightly is designed to showcase the more experimental builds of Firefox. The Nightly channel allows users to experience the newest Firefox innovations in an unstable environment and provide feedback on features and performance to help determine what makes the final release.
This app is designed for developers and testers. It may contain various bugs that can affect your usual work with the browser. Do you want to install it?

Firefox Browser for Android is automatically private and incredibly fast. Thousands of online trackers are following you every day, collecting information about where you go online and slowing down your speed. Firefox blocks over 2000 of these trackers by default and there are ad blocker add-ons available if you want to customize your browser even more. With Firefox, you’ll get the security you deserve and the speed you need in a private, mobile browser.

Definitely not brought to you by Mozilla! 

Iceraven Browser is a web browser for Android, based on Mozilla's Fenix version of Firefox, GeckoView and Mozilla Android Components. 

Our goal is to be a close fork of the new Firefox for Android that seeks to provide users with more options, more opportunities to customize (including a broad extension library), and more information about the pages they visit and how their browsers are interacting with those pages.

This is an updater for multiple browsers from Mozilla. Click the plus-button for installation and the down-arrow-button for updating. You can check for new updates by down-swiping or reopening the app. By default the app will check regularly for updates in the background. I did my best to secure the installation/updating process - feel free to double-check it or improve it by creating a pull-request. \n\nLast successful background update check: %1$s
If you think that FFUpdater has cached a faulty app update, click the \"clear cache\" button to delete the cache for this app.
External storage is not available - can\'t start download. Current status is:
GitHub-API rate limit is exceeded. Please try the download again in the next hour.

Either an attacker has replaced the correct download with a tampered one or the certificate checker doesn\'t work anymore. You can double-check the certificate fingerprint on apkmirror.com or you can create an issue on https://notabug.org/Tobiwan/ffupdater to inform my about the bug.

Either a tampered application has been installed or the certificate checker doesn\'t work anymore. You can double-check the certificate fingerprint on apkmirror.com or you can create an issue on https://notabug.org/Tobiwan/ffupdater to inform my about the bug. \n\nI recommend you to uninstall the application.
You can open the cache folder to copy the APK file to a place with more free storage.
A temporary network issue occurred. Please retry later.
Your device is low on storage (only %1$d MB free). This will lead to download or installation failure.
If you are using Xiaomi or MIUI, try disabling \"MIUI Optimization\".
You have to uninstall the existing app before FFUpdater can install or update the app. Backup your data because the uninstall will delete all your bookmarks, settings etc.

Reason: The current installed app is not signed by the original developer - maybe it\'s signed by F-Droid. Android refuses to update an app if different people signed the installed and the updated version.
You can now close this window
The latest version of this app is already installed. Do you want to download and install the latest version again?
PASSWORD ACCESS FOR YOU, & ONLY YOU \n\nSecurely track your Firefox passwords & access them anywhere. Quickly open any website from the app to get into your accounts

FFUpdater caches already downloaded app updates and stores them in the 'Android/data/de.marmaro.krt.ffupdater/files/Download' folder.

This saves bandwidth when an app is not successfully installed or updated. Also, the cache is needed so that updates that were downloaded in the background can be installed later.

If you decide to delete these app updates, you may have to download them again.
FFUpdater is missing the permission to install and update apps. You have to grant these permissions or FFUpdater will not work.
The app is downloading updates in the background now. Do you want to start a new download that may take longer?
The operation failed because not enough storage is available: %1$s
The operation failed in a generic way. The system will always try to provide a more specific failure reason, but in some rare cases this may be delivered.
The operation failed because it was actively aborted. For example, the user actively declined requested permissions, or the session was abandoned.

The operation failed because it was blocked. For example, a device policy may be blocking the operation, a package verifier may have blocked the operation, or the app may be required for core system operation.

The operation failed because it conflicts (or is inconsistent with) with another package already installed on the device. For example, an existing permission, incompatible certificates, etc. The user may be able to uninstall another app to fix the issue.

The operation failed because it is fundamentally incompatible with this device. For example, the app may require a hardware feature that doesn\'t exist, it may be missing native code for the ABIs supported by the device, or it requires a newer SDK version, etc.
The operation failed because one or more of the APKs was invalid. For example, they might be malformed, corrupt, incorrectly signed, mismatched, etc.

The operation failed because of storage issues. For example, the device may be running low on space, or external media may be unavailable. The user may be able to help free space or insert different external media.
When an update is detected, download it. This will later speed up the update process.
Not recommended for users with limited mobile data.
Download app updates on metered networks
Try to install updates without user interaction.
Check for new updates at regular intervals.
Useful if you don\'t want to update an app and don\'t want to receive update notifications for it.
Settings when the app is working in the background and is invisible to the user.
Useful for users with limited mobile data.
Choose between light and dark theme
Allow update checks on metered networks such as mobile data.
Settings when the user interface is visible.
App has been successfully updated in the background.

Google Chromium, sans integration with Google.\n\nWithout signing in to a Google Account, Chromium does pretty well in terms of security and privacy. However, Chromium still has some dependency on Google web services and binaries. In addition, Google designed Chromium to be easy and intuitive for users, which means they compromise on transparency and control of internal operations.
Ungoogled Chromium uses the technical foundation of the Google Chrome (Chromium) - some people don\'t like this. Do you want to install Ungoogled Chromium?
The selected browser is incompatible with your smartphone\'s processor. Please select a different browser.

Discover a blazingly fast Internet browser! Vivaldi is a new, free, and private web browser built with flexibility in mind. It comes packed with useful features including a built-in AdBlocker (pop-up blocker), tracking protection, and private translation. Browser options like proper desktop-style tabs, dark/light Themes, and layout choices help you make it yours.

Vivaldi is only partially open source (see https://vivaldi.com/blog/vivaldi-browser-open-source/ for more info). It also uses the technical foundation of the Google Chrome (Chromium).\n\nSome people don\'t like this. Do you want to install Vivaldi?

FFUpdater will ask for root permission if this option is enabled and an app is installed or updated. To gain root privileges, you must use Magisk or other tools. If enabled, FFUpdater will install or updates apps in the foreground and background without user interaction.
Use root permission to install or update apps
